collection_text: Our Collection exudes timeless elegance and contemporary charm, offering a perfect balance of style and comfort. With its clean lines, luxurious materials, and attention to detail, this collection creates an inviting and sophisticated atmosphere in any space. Each piece is designed to deliver both functionality and aesthetic appeal, making it ideal for those who appreciate refined design and enduring quality. Whether enhancing your living room, bedroom, or dining area, our Collection transforms your home with its versatile and graceful presence, offering a blend of modern luxury and classic beauty.

company.title: About Our Company
company.description: We create unique interior and exterior design concepts for our clients. Every detail combines elegance, quality, and modernity, turning your home into a true work of art.
company.whoWe: has become one of the most trusted brands in the field of interior and exterior design solutions. Our specialists combine modern design with traditional precision, creating spaces where aesthetics and comfort come together in perfect harmony.
company.subtitle: Why Choose Us
company.design_desc: We stay ahead of trends to deliver stylish, innovative designs.
company.material_desc: We use only durable and long-lasting premium materials for interior and exterior design.
company.skilled_desc: Our experienced artisans and designers bring passion to every detail.
company.brand_desc: We’ve built a reputation for excellence and reliability.

top.title: Our Artistic Journey
top.subtitle: Unveiling the Passion, Vision, and Expertise Behind Our Designs

mid.title: Designing Dreams: Our Story
mid.desc: At Architronix, design is our canvas, and spaces are our masterpieces. With a vision for elegance, functionality, and innovation, our diverse team curates exceptional spaces and dreams. From cosmopolitan apartments to countryside estates, we're committed to sustainable design practices that enrich lives and the planet.
mid.detail: Join us on a journey where every room is a canvas for creativity, and design transcends the ordinary. Together, let's craft your vision, one design at a time.

contactComp.title: We value every client relationship. In our interior and exterior design projects, we are committed not only to impeccable design but also to exceptional service.
contactComp.subtitle: From the first consultation to the final touch, we are always by your side — dedicated to trust, quality, and excellence.
contactComp.subdesc: To answer your questions, please contact us by filling out the contact form.

team-desc: At Nova House, architecture is more than design — it’s the art of shaping spaces that inspire connection, creativity, and comfort. Our team blends visionary thinking with technical precision to craft environments where modern aesthetics meet human experience.
team-title: Meet the Minds Behind Nova House
